movie1.title: How To Train Your Dragon
movie1.plot: Hiccup is a Norse teenager from the island of Berk, where fighting dragons is a way of life. His progressive views and weird sense of humor make him a misfit, despite the fact that his father is chief of the clan. Tossed into dragon-fighting school, he endeavors to prove himself as a true Viking, but when he befriends an injured dragon he names Toothless, he has the chance to plot a new course for his people's future.
movie1.Actors: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, America Ferrera, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Craig Ferguson, Kristen Wiig, T.J. Miller
movie1.Genre: Kids & family, Fantasy, Adventure, Comedy, Animation

movie2.title: Coco
movie2.plot: Despite his family's generations-old ban on music, young Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead. After meeting a charming trickster named Héctor, the two new friends embark on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.
movie2.Actors: Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach, Renée Victor, Ana Ofelia Murguía and Edward James Olmos
movie2.Genre: Kids & family, Comedy, Adventure, Music, Animation
